title: Quick guide
subtitle: Preparing your property
intro: Preparing your house for a photoshoot is a difficult task, this article will provide internn's 5 simple steps to getting the most out of your property shoot. If you're interested in making sure you get the maximum value from your photoshoot then do not hesitate to read on!

body.content: It is important to ensure your property is free from dust, marks and other debris that may remove attraction from buyers if caught in a picture. Therefore, it is important to thoroughly clean your property before your talented internn arrives.
